content.title: Intro
content.content: -ien or -iën is a Quenya suffix meaning "daughter".

content.title: Examples
content.content:
Lúthien = "Daughter of Spells", "Enchantress"[1]
Arien = "Maiden of Sunlight"[2]

content.title: References
content.content:
↑ Fauskanger Helge, "Doriathrin Wordlist", Ardalambion (accessed 6 December 2021)
↑ Fauskanger Helge, "Quenya Corpus Wordlist", Ardalambion (accessed 6 December 2021)
